value.title: PowerApps PDF from table data
value.excerpt: In this video, you will learn about creating PDFs with PowerApps and Flow. This is taking the concept we covered in an earlier video and going two steps deeper by pulling in dynamic data and building an HTML table on the fly with the Concat function. Exciting stuff.  Intro to creating a PDF with PowerApps

value.title: PowerApps SharePoint Complex Columns - Patch person, choice, and lookup fields
value.excerpt: In this video, you will learn how to Patch SharePoint Complex Columns with PowerApps. This includes Person, Choice, and Lookup columns. value.title: QTT - Power Apps Excel is a terrible data source
value.excerpt: This video explains all of the common problems with Excel as a data source for your Power Apps. But it also gives you reasons you might want to use it as a data source and some tips to use it if you do. But the key message is don't build production apps using Excel as your Data Source!  Power Apps Consulting

value.title: Intro to the PowerApps If Statement
